newsitem.title: UK: CSFB hires Prendergast as head of FX strategy.
newsitem.headline: CSFB hires Prendergast as head of FX strategy.

text.p: Credit Suisse First Boston said it has hired Joe Prendergast from Merrill Lynch in a newly created role as head of its global foreign exchange research and strategy, a CSFB spokesman said Tuesday.

Prendergast, who has worked as foreign exchange strategist at Merrill Lynch since July 1995, will be based in London and will report to Philip Vasan, head of global foreign exchange at CS First Boston in New York.
He will take up the post in late June, the spokesman said.
Prior to joining Merrill, Prendergast was a forex strategist at both Banque Paribas and MMS International in London.

"The new post will be part of the foreign exchange department where Joe will be the chief spokesman, but there will be a close collaboration with CSFB's global economics and research teams," said spokesman said.
